document.full_text: u.s. auto sales are expected to show a 16 percent increase for april, as the sales crunch dealt by the japanese earthquake and tsunami is not expected to show up in new auto purchases until may, automakers and analysts said.
document.title: april auto sales seen up but quake effects loom
lines_and_colors: u.s. auto sales are expected to show a 16 percent increase for april, as the sales crunch dealt by the japanese earthquake and tsunami is not expected to show up in new auto purchases until may, automakers and analysts said.
